laboratory_examinations.findings: Rim enhancing fluid collection in the right lower quadrant, minimally enlarged from 2.4 x 1.7 x 1.8 cm to 2.9 x 1.7 x 2.0 cm. Focal mucosal hyperemia, wall thickening, and fat stranding of a segment of distal descending colon, consistent with acute uncomplicated diverticulitis. No free air or extraluminal contrast. Small volume of ascites tracking to the pelvis.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Fluid collection size increased from 2.4 x 1.7 x 1.8 cm to 2.9 x 1.7 x 2.0 cm.

laboratory_examinations.findings: MIXED BACTERIAL FLORA (>= 3 COLONY TYPES), CONSISTENT WITH SKIN AND/OR GENITAL CONTAMINATION.
